Career highlights and awards: NBA Most Valuable Player (1993) | 11× NBA All-Star (1987-1997) | NBA All-Star Game MVP (1991) | 5× All-NBA First Team (1988-1991, 1993) | 5× All-NBA Second Team (1986, 1987, 1992, 1994, 1995) | All-NBA Third Team (1996) | NBA All-Rookie First Team (1985) | NBA rebounding leader (1988) | 3× IBM Award (1986-1988) | NBA anniversary team (50th, 75th) | No. 34 retired by Philadelphia 76ers | Phoenix Suns Ring of Honor | Third-team All-American - NABC (1984) | SEC Player of the Year (1984) | First-team All-SEC (1984) | 2× Second-team All-SEC (1982, 1983) | SEC Tournament MVP (1984) | No. 34 retired by Auburn Tigers
